title: Deep Codebase Cleansing
description: Perform a thorough cleanup of the codebase by removing unused files, code snippets, and garbage without changing or harming the current working state.

title: Identify Unused Files and Folders
description: Scan the codebase to identify files and folders that are no longer used or referenced after our MCP server fixes.

title: Remove Unused Code Snippets
description: Identify and remove unused code snippets, commented-out code, and redundant functions that are no longer needed after our simplification.

title: Clean Temporary and Generated Files
description: Identify and remove temporary files, logs, and generated files that are not needed for the project's operation.

title: Verify Working State After Cleanup
description: Run tests and verify that the MCP server still functions correctly after cleanup to ensure we haven't harmed the current working state.
